name: Blood Fortress
ability: Your Creature in this Lane has +1 ATK.

name: Cave of Solitude
ability: Discard a card >>> Your Creature in this Lane can't be targeted or attacked until the start of your next turn.

name: Celestial Castle
ability: Your Creature in this Lane has +3 DEF.

name: Elf Hut
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Draw a card for each Creature in this Lane.

name: Fountain of Tears
ability: While your Creature in this Lane has exactly 3 Damage on it, it has +3 ATK.

name: Fright Tower
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Target Creature in this Lane has +1 ATK this turn for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Igloo of Sanctuary
ability: FLOOP >>> If your Creature in this Lane moved here from another Lane this turn, it has +3 ATK this turn.

name: Mausoleum
ability: Your Creature in this Lane has +1 DEF for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Nice Windmill
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Heal or deal up to 2 Damage to your Creature in this Lane.

name: Night Tower
ability: FLOOP >>> If your opponent has no Creatures in this Lane, they discard a card.

name: Palace of Bone
ability: Opposing Creatures in this Lane don't trigger entering or leaving play effects.

name: Pyramidia
ability: FLOOP >>> If you control a Creature in this Lane, gain 1 Action. Use it only to play a Creature in this Lane.

name: Sand Pyramid
ability: Pay 2 Actions >>> Return each Creature in this Lane to its owner's hand. (Affects both players.)

name: Sand Sphinx
ability: FLOOP >>> Return a Creature you control in this Lane to its owner's hand.

name: Schoolhouse
ability: FLOOP >>> Your Creature in this Lane loses all abilities and gains the FLOOP ability of a random Creature (with a FLOOP ability) in your discard pile until end of turn.

name: Shadowy Pyramid
ability: FLOOP >>> Draw a card. If you control a Creature in this Lane, discard a card.

name: Silo of Justice
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature in this Lane and 1 Damage to its controller.

name: Silo of Truth
ability: Pay 2 Actions >>> Steal a random card from your opponent's hand and play it at no cost.

name: Spirit Tower
ability: Pay 1 Action and FLOOP >>> If you control no Creatures in this Lane, move target Creature in this Lane to your side and ready it. At the end of turn, return it to its owner's side.

name: Temple of the Sun
ability: When a SandyLands Creature with cost 1 or greater you control enters play in this Lane, you may return it to its owner's hand.

name: Windmill of Health
ability: While your Creature in this Lane has no Damage on it, it has +2 ATK.

name: Woad Mobile Home
ability: FLOOP >>> Move a Creature in an adjacent Lane to this Lane (if empty).

name: Yellow Lighthouse
ability: At the start of your turn, each player who controls a Creature in this Lane draws a card.

name: Auto-Plucker
ability: FLOOP >>> Heal or deal 1 Damage to your Creature in this Lane.

name: Cardboard Mansion
ability: Cardboard Mansion costs 1 less to play for every 5 cards in your discard pile. FLOOP >>> Gain 1 Action.

name: Crystal Palace
ability: When a Landscape in this Lane becomes Frozen, deal 2 Damage to target Creature.

name: Funeral Home
ability: Whenever a foe discards a card, your Creature in this Lane has +1 ATK until end of turn.

name: Ice-olation Cell
ability: Creatures on Landscapes with a Frozen token on it in this Lane cannot Attack or use abilities.

name: Snow Business
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Freeze target Landscape in this Lane.

name: The Big Hen House
ability: At the start of your turn, deal 1 or 2 Damage to your Creature in this Lane, then you heal 1 HP (Max 25).

name: Sundae School
ability: When you have an even amount of Hit Points, your Creature on this Landscape has +2 ATK.

name: Sinkhole
ability: Discard a card, FLOOP >> Flip target Landscape in this Lane face down until the start of your next turn.

name: Silo of Freedom
ability: Discard a card >>> Your Landscape in this Lane loses its type and becomes the type of your choice (except face down) until the start of your next turn.

name: Parrotmilitary Outpost
ability: Each Creature in this Lane has -1 ATK (min 0).

name: Floating Ice Palace
ability: Your Creature on this Landscape has +1 ATK during your turn for each Landscape with a Frozen token on it.

name: Snow Training Camp
ability: FLOOP >> Freeze both Landscapes in this Lane. Use only if no Frozen tokens are in play.

name: Fancy Spa
ability: At the start of your Fight Phase, if you control an exhausted Creature on this Landscape, draw a card.

name: Weary Trading Post
ability: FLOOP >>> Move an exhausted Creature you control to this Landscape (if empty).

name: Lunchpad
ability: FLOOP >>> Draw a card for each Creature that entered play onto this Landscape this turn.

name: Charming City
ability: All Creatures in this Lane lose their Landscape type and become Rainbow Creatures.

name: Learning Center
ability: Learning Center gains the game text of Buildings you control in adjacent Lanes (but not their names).

name: Blood Castle
ability: Each time an opposing Creature in this Lane takes Damage, increase the amount by 1.

name: Farmhouse
ability: Farmhouse counts as an additional Cornfield Landscape you control.

name: Cabin of Many Woods
ability: Cabin of Many Woods costs 1 less to play for each Flooped Creature you control. Your Creature in this Lane has +5 DEF.

name: Oil Refinery
ability: Your Creature on this Landscape has +2 DEF for each Oil Refinery you control.

name: Celestial Fortress
ability: The opposing Creature in this Lane has -2 DEF.

name: Bayou Fountain
ability: Discard a card >>> Your Creature on this Landscape has +1 ATK this turn. (Use any number of times during each of your turns.)

name: Bog Palace
ability: Your Creature on this Landscape has +3 ATK. At the start of each of your turns, discard a card.

name: Sand Castle
ability: Discard Sand Castle from play >>> Put your Creature on this Landscape into your hand and then play it for free.

name: Crab Skull Island
ability: Pay 1 Action, FLOOP >>> If this Landscape is empty, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Creature, then play it onto this Landscape for free and shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.

name: Cloud Tower
ability: Your Creature on this Landscape cannot be targeted by your foe's Spells or Creature abilities. FLOOP >>> Move a Creature you control to this Landscape.

name: Domed Stronghold
ability: Your Creature on this Landscape has +2 DEF and cannot be damaged by your foe's Spells.

name: Haybarn
ability: Pay 1 Action, FLOOP >>> If this Landscape is empty, play a 'Feedman' from your discard pile onto this Landscape for free. If Haybarn leaves play, destroy the Feedman on its Landscape.

name: Husker Garrison
ability: Your Creature on this Landscape has +1 ATK and +1 DEF for each Cornfield Creature you control.

name: Ice Base
ability: When Ice Base enters play, Freeze both Landscapes in this Lane. You may play Creatures onto this Landscape even while Frozen.

name: Snow Bank
ability: FLOOP, Remove a Frozen token from a Landscape in this Lane >>> Deal 3 Damage to target opponent.

name: Bean Ball Bomba
ability: FLOOP >>> Heal or deal Damage to your Creature on this Landscape until it has 4 Damage on it.

name: Pillow Fortress
ability: Pay 1 Action, FLOOP >> Heal 2 or deal 2 Damage to a Creature you control on this Landscape. Do the same to another friendly Creature.
